mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, product_cost, product_stock, product_content, product_img, product_thumb) VALUES (#{product_name},#{product_cost},#{product_stock},#{product_content},#{product_img},#{product_thumb})

select orderlist_no from orderlist where product_no=#{product_no} and member_id=#{member_id}
insert into pdreview(orderlist_no, pdreview_content,pdreview_date) values (#{orderlist_no},#{pdreview_content},sysdate())
